borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T23. London Plane (Platanus X hispanica)Cambridge GroveCrown lift over road to 5m. Reduce canopy back from Church building to give 3mclearance. Remove deadwood and hazardous branches.T33. London Plane (Platanus X hispanica)Playing fields Diseased tree, Significant decay present throughout stem. Dieback in canopy. Fell to ground level via sectional takedownT35. London Plane(Platanus X hispanica)Playing fields Decay fungus present on main stem. Crown reduce by 3m in height and 3m in lateral spread (to previous points) Retain naturalform of tree.T36. London Plane (Platanus X hispanica)Playing fields Crown clean (remove deadwood, crossing and hazardous branches). Crown thin canopy density by 20% via removal ofepicormic growth. T37. Wild Cherry (Prunus avium)Playing fieldsCrown lift by 2.5mT40. T42.London Plane (Platanus X hispanica)Tennis courts Previously reduced, dense regrowth. Crown thin canopy density by 25% via removal ofregrowth. Remove epicormic growth from trunk
